Topic.Title: Some Helpsheets by way of thanks

Posts.EditableText:
Not strictly a post for help but some helpsheets Ive made for my pupils (11 and 12 yr olds) based on lots of the questions I have asked on the Forum and the amazing answers I've got back.

The link is to a ZIP file and there are about 15 step by step helpsheets as PDFs. If you want Word files to edit I can be reached on twitter as @moodlegideon

[url:10q03cwj]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/7336564/IF-HELP/IF-HELP.zip[/url:10q03cwj]

Hope they might be of some use to people just starting out?

Posts.EditableText: You may want to ask some of the Vets here, most likely Alex in general, if you can have permission to post that on the wiki.  I have not even taken a look at what you have, but if it can be of any use, I think the wiki would make the most use of it.  Not every one is keen on downloading things, so if it is on the wiki they can simply look at it and learn.
